title: My pixel 2xl battery is depleting quicker after June 2020 update. The c type charger is not working.
content: My pixel 2xl battery is depleting much quicker after June 2020 update. The phone is also no longer charging via USBC to USBC. Only UsB A to USB C cables is working but as soon as the charger is connected the phone switches off. Support team has not resolved the issue yet even after follow ups. Anybody facing similar issue pls help.
